title: ‘Robin Hood’ set to return at MGM+

title: ‘Abolish ICE’ Wins Chicago’s Snowplow Naming Contest
desc: An annual contest usually draws lighthearted quips. This year, Chicagoans chose a political pun.

title: 'Only Living Pickpocket in New York' Sells After Sundance Premiere
desc: 'The Only Living Pickpocket in New York' has sold to Sony Pictures Classics after its Sundance Film Festival premiere.

title: Wittenoom traditional owners launch $1.5b asbestos contamination claim against WA government
desc: Banjima traditional owners say the thousands of hectares left poisoned by decades of asbestos mining have caused one of the highest death rates of mesothelioma in the world.

title: India seeks self-reliance in containers; but has The Great Wall to climb
desc: Nearly every product that crosses oceans travels in a steel container — and for decades, India was largely absent from this quiet yet critical industry, dominated by China. But container shortages during the pandemic forced a rethink. Today, as domestic manufacturers close the gap on quality and delivery, the challenge is no longer capability, but scale — and whether India can match China on price.

title: CMS saved $2 billion by using AI to fight fraud, official says

title: Ali May on Macrophages, Branching Organs, and Developmental Crosstalk
desc: On Thursday, Feb. 19, Ali May, an assistant professor at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai presented her research on the various ways tissue resident macrophages shape embryonic salivary gland development as part of the Department of Biology Seminar Series.

title: Chevy Corvette ZR1 Sets Car And Driver's New Lightning Lap Record, Beats McLaren Senna By 0.7 Seconds
desc: This isn't one of those, "Sure it's quick in a straight line, but what about corners?" conversations that people normally have about cheap American performance.

title: NNPC to export new crude grade, Cawthorne, in March
desc: The Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) Limited will commence exportation of Cawthorne, a new light, sweet crude grade, from the end of March.

title: Brazil floods and landslides kill at least 25 in Minas Gerais
desc: Hundreds of people have been displaced and dozens are missing, with rescue operations still ongoing in Juiz de Fora.
